thread.title: Great Mid Priced Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Mid Priced Hotel - Review of Skyline Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Soulsvillestax
title: Great Mid Priced Hotel
text: The Skyline is a little gem close to lots of the places that one could wish to visit in New York. It has been described as like a Premier lodge and I have to agree with that description. The beds are comfortable and the room is an adicate size. Internet is not free in the room but costs 2.95 a night internet is free in the lobby. The subway is two blocks away and the subway from JFK airport stops there. There is a hotel bar next to the lobby and restaurant serving Mexican food. There are 4 Deli's across the road. The staff are pleasant and helpful.
